data.meta_site_name: Frederic Mulhausen Obituary | October 8, 2023 | Maher Funeral Home - Tinley Park, IL
data.text:
Frederic Joseph Mulhausen, known to his loved ones as Fritz, passed away on October 8, 2023, in Alsip, Illinois, at the age of 38. Born on October 27, 1984, Fritz was a beloved son, brother, nephew, grandson, uncle, and friend. He will be deeply missed by all who had the privilege of knowing him.

Fritz was a caring and compassionate individual, always putting the needs of his family and friends first. He held a special place in his heart for his siblings and cousins, acting as a big brother figure to them all. His warm and nurturing nature made him someone that everyone could rely on.

In his youth, Fritz attended St. Charles North High School, where he undoubtedly made lasting memories and formed lifelong friendships. He valued these friendships and loved seeing their happiness, always encouraging those around him to pursue their dreams.

Fritz is survived by his father, Frederic W. Mulhausen, his grandmothers Dolores Mulhausen and Deanna Diaz, his sister Erin (Bryan) Nemeth, his brother Colin Mulhausen, his nephew Jack Nemeth, his nieces Emma Nemeth and Rylee Mulhausen. He was preceded in death by his mother, Madonna J. McElligott, his grandfather, Frederic K. Mulhausen, uncles David Mulhausen and Matthew McElligott.

To honor Fritz's life and the impact he had on all those who knew him, a Celebration of Life will be held on Friday, October 20th at Jamo's Live, located at 10160 191st St, Mokena, IL 60448. The event will take place from 5:00 PM to 10:00 PM. This gathering will provide an opportunity for family, friends, and loved ones to come together, share memories, and support each other during this difficult time.

Fritz's kind spirit, unwavering love for his family, and genuine care for others will forever be remembered. May his soul rest in peace, and may his memory be a source of comfort and inspiration to all who knew him.
